name: Soleil Citrus & Herb Olive Medley
description: Elevate your appetizer game with Soleil Citrus & Herb Olive Medley. This handpicked assortment of green and black olives is marinated in a zesty blend of sun-ripened citrus peels, fresh rosemary, thyme, and a touch of garlic. A splash of cold-pressed olive oil enhances the flavor profile, making these olives the perfect companion for cheese boards, salads, or Mediterranean-inspired dishes. Naturally gluten-free and vegan, this medley is a gourmet treat for discerning palates.

attributes.ingredients: Green olives, black olives, olive oil, citrus peel, rosemary, thyme, garlic, sea salt
